edu.illinois.cs.cogcomp.annotation

Interface TextAnnotationBuilder

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BasicTextAnnotationBuilder, CuratorTextAnnotationBuilder, TokenizerTextAnnotationBuilder

    public interface TextAnnotationBuilder
    The interface that will be used by any TextAnnotation creation method that requires tokenization. An implementation using CogComp's default tokenizer can be found in illinois-tokenizer

    A class that implements this interface must create two views: ViewNames.SENTENCE and ViewNames.TOKENS.

    To create a TextAnnotation from pre-tokenized text (e.g. from training corpora) please use BasicTextAnnotationBuilder.
